AutoEnableTetheredCaching.title: Auto Enable Tethered Caching
AutoEnableTetheredCaching.description: Automatically enable Internet connection sharing when possible and prevent disabling Internet connection sharing.

AllowSharedCaching.title: Allow Shared Caching
AllowSharedCaching.description: If true, caches non-iCloud content, such as apps and software updates.

AllowPersonalCaching.title: Allow Personal Caching
AllowPersonalCaching.description: If true, caches the user's iCloud data.
